title: Episode Four: Jules & Lassie - Speak Now or Forever Hold Your Piece
description:
In this episode it’s all Maggie and Tim! They talk about how they got their roles on Psych, where their incredible "act the shit of it" pep talk originated and focus on Season One Episode Three: Speak Now or Forever Hold Your Piece. Plus, Producer Devin pops in for a hot sec to talk Psych!
